qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: All our handymen are vetted and qualified to ensure top-notch service quality for every job.

customerSatisfaction.title: Customer Satisfaction
customerSatisfaction.description: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We ensure every service meets your expectations.

onTimeService.title: On-Time Service
onTimeService.description: We value your time and ensure our handymen arrive on schedule for every appointment.

services.title: MOST POPULAR SERVICES
services.subtitle: From carpentry to electrical repairs, we've got you covered for all your home maintenance needs.

carpentry.title: Carpentry
carpentry.description: Expert carpentry services for furniture assembly, repairs, custom builds, and more.

plumbing.title: Plumbing
plumbing.description: Professional plumbing solutions for leaks, installations, repairs, and maintenance.

electrical.title: Electrical
electrical.description: Skilled electricians for installations, repairs, wiring, and electrical troubleshooting.

chooseService.title: Choose Service
chooseService.description: Browse through our service categories and select what you need assistance with.

chooseProvider.title: Choose Service Provider
chooseProvider.description: Select a skilled handyman from our network of verified professionals.

createBooking.title: Create Booking
createBooking.description: Fill in all the work details including location, date, time, and specific requirements.

handymanConfirms.title: Handyman Confirms
handymanConfirms.description: The handyman reviews your booking and confirms it with a service fee.

customerPays.title: Pay & Confirm
customerPays.description: Review the fee and if satisfied, make secure payment to confirm the booking.

handymanCompletes.title: Work Completion
handymanCompletes.description: The handyman arrives at your location and completes the service work.

customerReviews.title: Confirm & Review
customerReviews.description: Confirm the job completion and leave a review to help others make informed decisions.

testimonial1.quote: FixFinder connected me with an amazing handyman who fixed my leaking faucet quickly and professionally. Highly recommend!
testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson

testimonial2.quote: The platform is easy to use and helped me find reliable help for a home renovation. The handyman was punctual and exceeded my expectations.
testimonial2.name: Michael Lee

testimonial3.quote: I love how secure and simple FixFinder makes payments. The handyman was great and I'll definitely be using this service again!
testimonial3.name: Emily Smith

footer.description: Connecting you to reliable handyman services for all your home maintenance and repair needs.
footer.subscribeDescription: Subscribe to our newsletter for tips, updates and special offers.

hero.title: About FixFinder
hero.subtitle: Your trusted platform for connecting with skilled handymen for all your home maintenance needs

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.paragraph1: FixFinder was founded with a simple mission: to connect homeowners and businesses with reliable, skilled handymen who can tackle any home maintenance or repair project efficiently and affordably.
whoWeAre.paragraph2: Our platform makes it easy to find, book, and pay for handyman services, eliminating the hassle of searching for trusted professionals when you need help around your home or office.
whoWeAre.paragraph3: We carefully vet all handymen on our platform to ensure they have the skills, experience, and professionalism to deliver high-quality services that meet our standards and exceed your expectations.

forCustomers.title: For Customers
forCustomers.description: We aim to provide a hassle-free experience for finding reliable handymen, ensuring your home maintenance and repair needs are met with quality service, fair pricing, and professional conduct.

forHandymen.title: For Handymen
forHandymen.description: We strive to create opportunities for skilled tradespeople to connect with clients in their area, grow their business, and showcase their expertise through a trusted platform that values their skills.

forCommunities.title: For Communities
forCommunities.description: We work to strengthen local economies by facilitating connections between community members and local service providers, keeping skills and resources within neighborhoods.

hero.title: EXPLORE OUR WIDE RANGE OF SERVICES
hero.subtitle: Whatever your home maintenance or repair needs, our team of skilled handymen are ready to help
